mechanics.trigger: A creature you can see attacks a target other than you
mechanics.condition: The target is within 5 feet of you AND You are wielding a shield AND You use your reaction
mechanics.outcome: Impose disadvantage on the attack roll

description_text: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.
